byline.contributor: Mitch Smith contributed reporting from Skokie, Ill., and Charlie Savage from Washington.
byline.original: By SHERYL GAY STOLBERG and ADAM LIPTAK

abstract: Man in the News profile of Judge Merrick B Garland, whom Pres Obama has nominated to Supreme Court; Garland, who is chief judge of United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit, says he has dreamed of becoming Supreme Court justice for years; his long career on bench has left him with reputation as moderate jurist who is widely admired by members of both political parties.
lead_paragraph: A series of carefully considered steps has positioned Judge Merrick B. Garland for a job his friends say he has dreamed of for years: a seat on the United States Supreme Court.

headline.main: Merrick Garland’s Path to Nomination Marked by Deference, With Limits

snippet: A series of carefully considered steps has positioned Judge Merrick B. Garland for a job his friends say he has dreamed of for years: a seat on the United States Supreme Court.
